thread.title: A slimmer Pablo Sandoval shows up early to Red Sox camp
thread.title_full: A slimmer Pablo Sandoval shows up early to Red Sox camp

title: A slimmer Pablo Sandoval shows up early to Red Sox camp
text:
A slimmer Pablo Sandoval shows up early to Red Sox camp A slimmer Pablo Sandoval shows up early to Red Sox camp Pablo Sandoval took some batting practice Thursday. –Andrea Melendez / The News-Press By The Boston Globe February 10, 2017 
Sign up for Boston Globe's 108 Stitches newsletter and be entered to win a four-pack of tickets to the Red Sox home game on August 28th. Get everything baseball, straight from the desk of Alex Speier. Mon-Fri during the season, and weekly in the offseason. FORT MYERS, Fla. — Pablo looks good for Pablo. Pablo Sandoval has lost weight. Some estimates have him down 30 pounds. He’s trying. Food is hard to push aside. It’s his vice. It’s probably a vice for many of us, but an athlete earning $17.6 million a season has to have discipline. Read the complete story at BostonGlobe.com . Don’t have a Globe subscription?
